saao/saa21/P237283
x ni x x x x x x kî x x x x x x aṣbatu x x x x x attunu x x x x x šunkunu x x x x x u ana x x x x x-na īnāya ina muhhikunu sahrā 0 dēnkunu eppuš u ina muhhikunu u niqêkunu ša ana Babili akappuda adû rāšāni ša Mat-Akkadi altaprakkunūši kî mala epēše maṣṣākunu epšā u kî lā libbikunu adi bīt taṣabbatā epšā
